post.body: I'm here!

Salutation is gender (Mr/Ms/Mrs) and status ("nee") identification; title is afforded courtesy of education (Dr) (or birthright)
As do I (see: experience with protocal as Gov. Thompson's legal asst): What you're talking abt is salutation, not title.
It's not a title actually it's a salutation. Which, the adherence to is a valuable tradition.
in holiday mode. Your mission, should you choose to accept it (Mad twitters): Join the insanity at lamark.

almond flour does!
